Name: Mistweaver Adept
Story Background: Trained in the ancient art of mist magic, the Mistweaver Adepts are revered for their ability to bend and manipulate the very essence of the atmosphere.
Ability: When Mistweaver Adept enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand. If you do, scry 2.
Appearance Description: The Mistweaver Adept is cloaked in a flowing robe crafted from shimmering mist, and their eyes shimmer with a faint blue glow. They carry a staff adorned with swirling mist that exudes a tranquil aura.
